response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what you might find elsewhere. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $110 for this exceptional product. We believe this offers a fair compromise between the value we see in the product and what you're willing to pay. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 110}
